ygData.subject: splitpaw
ygData.msgSnippet: My regular group (28 Pally, 29 druid and 28 warrior) and I at 32 are hunting the entrance to Infected PAW tonight. Looking at the map from eqatlas.com, looks
ygData.messageBody:
My regular group (28 Pally, 29 druid and 28 warrior)
and I at 32 are hunting the entrance to Infected PAW
tonight.

Looking at the map from eqatlas.com, looks like the
fabled Kisch drops very far from the entrance but my
initial contact with the place was very intense and
enjoyable.

Lots of action in this place -- looks to me like two
full groups are needed to keep the entry areas clean
of spawn...we'll prolly be here a bit since the xp and
loot rock. That said, can anyone give me advice on
invading the deeper regions?

Thanks,

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Already tired of twisting Hymm and Chourus of Clarity
